description: Set options on specific levels. Takes precedence over series options, but not point options.

children.name: borderColor
children.description: Can set a borderColor on all points which lies on the same level.

children.name: borderDashStyle
children.description: Can set a borderDashStyle on all points which lies on the same level.

children.name: borderWidth
children.description: Can set a borderWidth on all points which lies on the same level.

children.name: color
children.description: Can set a color on all points which lies on the same level.

children.name: colorVariation
children.description: Can set a colorVariation on all points which lies on the same level.

children.name: dataLabels
children.description: Can set dataLabels on all points which lies on the same level.

children.name: levelSize
children.description: Can set a levelSize on all points which lies on the same level.

children.name: rotation
children.description: Can set a rotation on all points which lies on the same level.

children.name: rotationMode
children.description: Can set a rotationMode on all points which lies on the same level.
